title: Russia, change and impact of govt. control of oil

content.question: Identify one natural resource on which Russia’s economy depends. Describe how the Russian government’s control over natural resources has changed since 2000. Describe one political consequence of the change in the Russian government’s control over natural resources since 2000.

frqParts.text: Identify one natural resource on which Russia’s economy depends. Describe how the Russian government’s control over natural resources has changed since 2000. Describe one political consequence of the change in the Russian government’s control over natural resources since 2000.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply in a course country.
